message: Does any vim hacker have a recommended setup for iOS dev?
I'm just trying out cocoa.vim. Not sure if there's any better options.
cocoa.vim seems pretty cool. does the documentation part (K) work for you?

Syntax highlighting and ctags integration can be a pain, especially if you are working in ObjC++ instead of pure ObjC.  There are ctag extensions that include ObjC, but those are not the standard packages you'll get via port/brew/etc, so you'll have to sync off of someone's github repo and make/setup yourself.  You'll probably have to manage the .xcodeproj directly via Xcode anyway.  I love vim and dislike Xcode, but I still find myself in Xcode about 50% of the time (better code-completion/etc).
